::Lambda::
    "I'm not so sure that bending is always a bad thing.  Take the trees for 
instance.  In a strong wind those that can bend survive those that can't are 
broken and splintered.  But you are right the strong must rule over the weak. 
 However they must also know when to bend in order to survive.  Do you think 
you could show me around?"
